dataList.dlg: Employee Gregor, reporting in for duty! It's an honor to join your mission, Manager!
Good morning, Manager! Morning roll call was all clear!
It's lunch hours, Manager! I'll perform the remaining tasks with due diligence!
Nothing to report, Manager Dante!
Manager! I'm still adjusting to life here... but thanks to everyone's assistance, I am without trouble. Ms. Rodya often has unsavory comments, but... Haha, it's all fine.
I'll fight my enemies without hesitation. I'd made up my mind from the day I was honored with an opportunity to get the modification procedure.
Oh, this arm? I'm proud of it. It's a tremendous boon to be able to enter the fray of battle... rather than helplessly watch from afar.
The augment... I don't regret it. One downside, however...is that I won't ever be able to return to life as a civilian.
Nowadays... I try not to think much about what I do. It's getting too taxing to keep up with this otherwise.
Manager? I see you've taken a temporary leave. I'll be on standby.
Salutations! I'll continue to aid you to the best of my ability, Manager!
It's an honor, Manager!
I will do my utmost!
Manager Corporal Gregor reports!
Roger that!
I got a clean hit!
Nghâ€¦
I took one down!
I'll work harder to make up for it...
Spelendid strategy, Manager!
You trusted me with it...yet I failed.
It's all thanks to you, Manager. Your tactical prowess shined.
This victory was all thanks to you, Manager.
This...is what a war is. I was unqualified.
